posts.post_content:
T206 Cobb graded PSA 1.5. The front presents extremely well. The card was removed from an album and shows some minor back damage.

I am new on this forum but have been on eBay since 1997 (ID: slaudio).

SOLD includes shipping, net to me.

Thanks for looking.

If anyone has any nerves about dealing with a new member, I just bought Steve's T206 Lajoie and Johnson Portraits.   Steve was great to deal with, the transaction went flawlessly, and the cards are stunning.

Pete messaging on a T206?

Great card, congrats!
